Scroll down to see our beer garden, karoake bar, cocktail den and coffee shop

FAUST

Coming soon to satisfy all of your eating & drinking needs, Faust will be a Hofbrauhaus in the grand German tradition. Faust will offer an assortment of sausages, traditional sides, house-made Bavarian pretzels and authentic entrées augmented by a dedicated Bavarian draught list, American craft brews and a rotating selection of guest beers. Join us at Faust to stave off the impending winter chill and then welcome spring's quick return! Trinksprüche, Zum Wohl und Prost.

THE BOOMBOX

The Boombox is Providence's first and only karaoke lounge. Taking inspiration from the popular karaoke boxes in Asia, The Boombox is the perfect destination for birthdays, celebrations, or any festive gathering. Sing in the main room if the sake's got you feeling bold, or rent a room by the hour for a private singing party for two to twenty.

BOLT COFFEE

Stop by Bolt Coffee Company in the lobby for a fresh brew at any time of day. Bolt offers a selection of coffees from rich espresso to frothy lattes. Grab one to go, or lounge in the library for a meeting, a date or just a moment with a great book.

THE MAGDALENAE ROOM

Providence’s most noted barman, Mike Sears, helms The Magdalenae Room at the Dean, an intimate and discrete cocktail lounge reminiscent of the fine hotel bars of Europe. Meet friends, strangers and lovers at The Magdalenae Room tonight.

BOOK NOW

We are now taking reservations by telephone. Rooms available from January 12th, 2014. To make a reservation at The Dean please call us directly at +1 401 455 3326. Online booking for The Dean coming soon!
